text: Ust Allohi jagona, ki hec ma'ʙudi ʙarhaq cuz U nest, podsohi cami'i asjoho ast, nihojat pok ast, salomat ast (az har ajʙu nuqs), eminiʙaxs ast, ki pajomʙaronasro ʙa vositai mu'cizoti ravsan tasdiq menamojad, nigahʙon ast, ʙar hamai a'moli xalqas, piruzmand ast, ki hargiz maƣluʙ namesavad, caʙʙor ast, ki ƣalaʙai Uro kase toʙ ovarda nametavonad va hamai ofaridaho dar ʙaroʙari U furutanand, ʙuzurgvor ast, ki doroi kiʙrijo va azamat ast. Pok ast Alloh az on ci musrikon ʙaroi U dar iʙodat va sifot va ofarinisi U sarik qaror medihand
